CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( IF( CONTAINS($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, 'visual'), 'https://'+ MID($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( 'visual', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)-5,5) +'salesforce.com/', LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) ) + Id , Name,"_top"
)
CustomField.label: Proposal Link
